name.text: ICoLearn - Internet and collaborative based learning methodologies toolbox for digital transformation and sustainable growth |<b> Project No.: 101127224

package.title: Work Package 3
package.subtitle: Design and Organization
package.text1: Duration:M13 – M24 Lead Beneficiary:6- UCR Objectives:
package.o1: Define the detailed procedures and programs for implementation of learning methodologies internet-based and collaborative tools in the selected subjects (curricula units) at the Partner Countries HEI, for each curricula unit involved.
package.o2: Selection of enterprises which will provide tasks/assignments for students for LF and BL.
package.o3: Detailed specification of tasks/assignments for implementation of learning methodologies internet-based and collaborative tools in the selected subjects (curricula units), at the Partner Countries partners’ universities for application within the each subject (curricula unit).
package.o4: Scheduling plan for the teaching and students work on pre-defined tasks/assignments along the semester, for implementation, and realization, of the learning methodologies internet-based and collaborative tools for each of the selected subjects (curricula units), at the Partner Countries partners’ universities.
package.d1: D3.1 - Tool application design and procedure
